short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Automatically adjusts the volume on Youtube™ videos.
short.da,no: Justerer lydstyrken automatisk på Youtube™ videoer.
short.de: Passt die lautstärke von Youtube™ Videos automatisch an.
short.es: Ajusta automáticamente el volumen de los videos de Youtube™.
short.fil: Awtomatikong inaayos ang lakas sa mga video sa Youtube™.
short.fr: Ajuste automatiquement le volume des vidéos Youtube™.
short.id: Secara otomatis menyesuaikan kenyaringan pada video Youtube™.
short.pl: Automatycznie dostosowuje głośność w filmach Youtube™.
short.ru: Автоматически регулирует громкость видео на Youtube™.
short.th: ปรับความดังของวิดีโอ Youtube ™โดยอัตโนมัติ
short.vi: Tự động điều chỉnh âm lượng trên video Youtube™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Tired of manually having to adjust the volume of different YouTube™ videos? It's hard to believe this is still a problem, that's why we developed SameVolume for YouTube™. It automatically corrects the volume to the same level on all YouTube™ videos.

Features:
* Automatically corrects YouTube™ volume.
* Blocks all ads.
* Visualizing volume on tabs.
* Boost volume up to 500%.
* Automatically likes subscribed videos.
* Download and convert your own mp3's in the background.*

*Requires file permissions, activate this in the options.

How to use the extension:
- Click on extensions symbol to pin it to the menubar.
- Adjust any options to your own liking.

Note: YouTube is trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions. This extension is NOT associated with YouTube or Google Inc in any ways.
long.da,de,es,fil,fr,id,it,no,pl,ru,th,vi: Automatically adjusting volume of YouTube videos.
